job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity paypal nasdaq pypl is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy our open digital payments platform gives paypals million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways whether they are online on a mobile device in an app or in person through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships paypal creates better ways to manage and move money and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments paying or getting paid available in more than markets around the world the paypal platform including braintree venmo and xoom enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than currencies withdraw funds in currencies and hold balances in their paypal accounts in currenciesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob description summaryltbrgtltstronggtpaypals send money web team is looking for a fullstack javascript engineer the perfect candidate will demonstrate thought leadership great execution skills and a passion for delivering superior user experiences youll be joining a team that delivers at high frequency by using and creating the latest technologies we were the first paypal team to replace java with nodejs in and nodejs is currently in use by almost all web applications at paypal we have also been at the forefront in react and redux adoption including first production use when you join us youll become part of our goal of making paypal the best way to send money worldwide join us and create products used by millions of people all over the worldltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtjob descriptionltbrgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltulgtltligtwrite web application code following best practices of accessibility internationalization test driven developmentltligtltligtpartner closely with designproduct to craft great product experiencesltligtltligtdeliver code in an agile devops environmentltligtltligtlead code reviews to drive teams to the highest standards for nodejs apps and web appsltligtltligtprovide architectural leadership in product development teamltligtltligtdrive teams to follow clean code principles ltligtltligtdrive innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative developmentltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtrequired skillsltbrgtltulgtltligtproduction nodejs application development experienceltligtltligtproduction javascript application design and testing experienceltligtltligtsolid experience building applications on top of restful apisltligtltligtsolid knowledge of frameworks such as react and redux preferred ltligtltligtexperience with web frontend technologies such as html css webpack less bootstrapltligtltligtsolid knowledge of algorithms design pattern and componentization approachesltligtltligtexperience with crossbrowser crossplatform and design constraints on the webltligtltligtstrong attention to detailltligtltligtproven problemsolving and interpersonal communication skillsltligtltligtstrong desire to learn push yourself and coworkers to excel and share knowledge with othersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtwere a purposedriven company whose beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day we hold ourselves to our one team behaviors which demand that we hold the highest ethical standards to empower an open and diverse workplace and strive to treat everyone who is touched by our business with dignity and respect our employees challenge the status quo ask questions and find solutions we want to break down barriers to financial empowerment join us as we change the way the world defines financial freedomltbrgtltbrgtpaypal provides equal employment opportunity eeo to all persons regardless of age color national origin citizenship status physical or mental disability race religion creed gender
